content: rounds 24 round 12 2dec 3sc decrease 3sc around 18 round 13 3dec single_crochet around ending on 2 decrease 10 round 14 decrease around 5 f/o do not overstuff craftasaurustex arms/legs make 4 do not stuff round 1 magic_ring 3 4 round 2 increase around 6 round 3-5 single_crochet around 3 rounds 6 f/o leave tail to sew onto the body tail zipper sennit about an inch long leave a tail to sew onto the body you make a slip knot in the middle of a long length of yarn and alternate pulling a loop through the slip knot loop tightening the slip knot loop onto that new loop then pulling another loop through that loop with the other leg of yarn zipper chain 7 single_crochet back 6 f/o leave a tail to sew onto the body zipper pull tab chain 4 slip_stitch back 3 f/o leave a tail to sew onto the body ears make 2 chain 13 2nd from hook 2dc 2hdc 5sc 3 slip_stitch f/o leave a tail to sew onto the body tongue f hook chain 4 5 row single_crochet across 3 do not chain 1 at the end of your row f/o and weave your tail back to the top for sewing onto the head craftasaurustex assembly 1 sew eyes onto the head towards the bottom of the face and add pupils 2 sew the body onto the head towards the back of the head 3 sew the arms and legs on 4 embroider the zig zag on the zipper and sew it on with the pull tab 5 sew the tail on 6 sew the tongue onto the bottom of the head 7 sew the ears onto the top of the head at the back 8 embroider the black stitches around his whole body 9 embroider the nose you can sell items you make with this pattern this pattern is free you cannot sell this pattern you can share this pattern anywhere in any way please do not remove my contact information © 2015 nichole s nerdy knots craftasaurustex
